text: Wa Man Lam Yastati` Minkum Tawlaan 'An Yankiha Al-Muhsanati Al-Mu'uminati Famin Ma Malakat 'Aymanukum Min Fatayatikumu Al-Mu'uminati Wa Allahu 'A`lamu Bi'imanikum Ba`đukum Min Ba`đin Fankihuhunna Bi'idhni 'Ahlihinna Wa 'Atuhunna 'Ujurahunna Bil-Ma`rufi Muhsanatin Ghayra Musafihatin Wa La Muttakhidhati 'Akhdanin Fa'idha 'Uhsinna Fa'in 'Atayna Bifahishatin Fa`alayhinna Nisfu Ma `Ala Al-Muhsanati Mina Al-`Adhabi Dhalika Liman Khashiya Al-`Anata Minkum Wa 'An Tasbiru Khayrun Lakum Wa Allahu Ghafurun Rahimun
